data.name: textBox1.Text
data.value:
Item IDs: from duel/WIN64/ItemInfo.xfbin
BATTLE_ITEM76: Health Up (Small) c_bat_148: Recover minimal Health.
BATTLE_ITEM77: Health Up (Medium) c_bat_149: Recover a little Health.
BATTLE_ITEM78: Health Up (Large) c_bat_150: Recover some Health.
BATTLE_ITEM81: Chakra Up (Small) c_bat_153: Recover a little Chakra.
BATTLE_ITEM82: Chakra Up (Medium) c_bat_154: Recover some Chakra.
BATTLE_ITEM83: Chakra Up (Large) c_bat_155: Recover a lot of Chakra.
BATTLE_ITEM84: Auto-Sub (Small) c_bat_156: Substitution Jutsu activates automatically for a short period of time.
BATTLE_ITEM87: Chain mail (Small) c_bat_159: Shuriken won't work for a period of time. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM90: Attack Up Pill (Small) c_bat_162: ATK is boosted for a set amount of time. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM93: Defense Up Pill (Small) c_bat_165: DEF is boosted for a set amount of time. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM96: Attack Down Tag (Small) c_bat_168: Opponent's ATK is reduced for a set period. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM99: Defense Down Tag (Small) c_bat_171: Opponent's DEF is reduced for a set period. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM102: Speed Down Tag (Small) c_bat_174: Opponent's Movement Speed is reduced for a set period. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM105: Sleep Tag (Small) c_bat_177: Put your opponent to sleep and make them Defenseless for a short set period.
BATTLE_ITEM105: Seal Tag (Small) c_bat_180: Make opponent's Chakra Unusable for a set period. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM111: Kunai Parachute (Small) c_bat_183: Shoot Kunai from a parachute thrown into the air. Small damage.
BATTLE_ITEM114: Explosive Tag (Small) c_bat_186: A tag you've thrown explodes. Small damage.
BATTLE_ITEM117: Chakra Recovery Up (Small) c_bat_189: For a set amount of time Chakra Recovery Speed is boosted a little.
BATTLE_ITEM120: Max Chakra Up (Small) c_bat_192: Recover a little of your lost Chakra Gauge.
BATTLE_ITEM123: Substitution Recovery Up (Small) c_bat_195: For a set amount of time, Substitution Gauge Recovery Speed is boosted. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM126: Speed Up Pill (Small) c_bat_198: For a set amount of time, Movement Speed is boosted. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM131: Guard Break Up Pill (Small) c_bat_203: For a set amount of time, Guard Break Ability is boosted. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM134: Poison Tag (Small) c_bat_206: For a set amount of time, damage your opponent with Poison. Small damage.
BATTLE_ITEM137: Chakra Absorb Tag (Small) c_bat_209: Steal a little of your opponents Chakra and add it to your own.
BATTLE_ITEM139: Storm Gauge Up (Small) c_bat_211: For a set amount of time, Storm Gauge fills up easily. Short duration and small recovery.
BATTLE_ITEM141: Kunai Bag (Small) c_bat_213: Shoot Kunai from a bag set on the ground. Small damage.
BATTLE_ITEM144: Explosive Ball (Small) c_bat_216: A thrown ball explodes. Small damage.
BATTLE_ITEM147: Lightning Kunai (Small) c_bat_219: A Kunai you've thrown emits lightning, attacking a set area. Short duration.
BATTLE_ITEM150: Guard Break Attack c_bat_611: Charge and immobilize the opponent for a set amount of time (cannot guard).
